title: Lowest Net Financial Flows from IBRD
description: In 2023, Mexico had the lowest net financial flows from the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development (IBRD) at -$1,213,761,000.

title: Lowest Taxes on Exports
description: In 2022, taxes on exports in Mexico accounted for a mere 0.0000013% of the total tax revenue, one of the lowest in the world.

title: High Proportion of Time Spent on Unpaid Domestic Work by Women
description: In 2019, Mexican women spent 27.77% of their day on unpaid domestic and care work, one of the highest proportions globally.
